meanings.definition: The act of rotating the hand or forearm so that the palm faces downwards.
meanings.sent1: During the exercise, proper pronation helps prevent wrist strain.
meanings.sent2: His pronation was evident as he turned his hand to pick up the object.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a sudden pronation of his hand, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her pronation of the hand was as smooth as a dancer's pirouette.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of correct pronation to avoid injury.
